name: Stuck in Room
description:
So Guys I have Created Stuck in Room which is related to Stuck in a loop , In this there are 10 Rooms with enemys and with 2 door one door will be take you to the next Room and another take you to directly to Room1 and there is no way to exit rather then door and you have 3 weapons to fight with Enemys...

Twist : Every time Door Value  is Going to be changed

So i hope you like my game...
